Particulars: Name of the fund
Heading: Notes to Financial statements
Validation Rules: Non-empty, String, Proper capitalization, No special characters

Particulars: The day when Fund becomes operational
Heading: Notes to Financial statements
Validation Rules: Date presence (Fail), Format (Fail), Single value (Fail), Chronology (Pass), Numeric validity (Pass)

Particulars: what will be the benchmark of the fund on the basis which performance would be calculated
Heading: Summary
Sub- Heading: Principal Risk of investing in the Trust
Validation Rules: Benchmark type (Pass), String format (Pass)

Particulars: weather fund is going to be actively managed or going to replicate the index which is passive strategy
Heading: Summary
Sub- Heading: Principal Risk of investing in the Trust
Validation Rules: Presence (Pass – strategy is stated),Strategy type (Pass – passive vs active is clear),Clarity (Pass – no ambiguity)

Particulars: The fund Issue and redeem units in large lot sizes /creation units
Where we get Information in Prospectus: Purchases and redemptions of creation units
Heading: Purchases and redemptions of creation units
Validation Rules: Must be a clear statement, not implied.Must specify that units are issued/redeemed in large lot sizes.

Particulars: Underwriter of units/maintains record of creation unit orders
Where we get Information in Prospectus: Purchases and redemptions of creation units
Heading: Purchases and redemptions of creation units
Validation Rules: Must provide the legal name of the distributor/underwriter.Should follow proper capitalization and company suffix (Inc., LLC, etc.).Must avoid encoding errors or garbled characters.

Particulars: Fee payable in connection with each creation and redemption of units
Where we get Information in Prospectus: Purchases and redemptions of creation units
Heading: Purchase(Creation)
Validation Rules: Must explicitly state the numeric fee amount for creation/redemption.Should be expressed in a valid currency format (e.g., USD, INR).

Particulars: which accounting principles will the auditor follow
Where we get Information in Prospectus: Report of independent registered public accounting firm
Heading: Report of independent registered public accounting firm
Validation Rules: Must specify the accounting principles followed (e.g., US GAAP, IFRS).Should be a recognized standard, not just the auditor’s name.

Particulars: what is going to be frequency to determine the NAV of the fund
Heading: DETERMINATION OF NET ASSET VALUE
Validation Rules: Should use a valid time format (HH:MM with AM/PM).

Particulars: which price would be used to calculate the NAV of the fund
Heading: DETERMINATION OF NET ASSET VALUE
Validation Rules: Should total to a clear aggregate % of net assets.Must use valid numeric/percentage format.

Particulars: Different kinds expenses/fess bourne by the fund
Where we get Information in Prospectus: In the summary section of the prospectus we will get this information
Heading: Summary
Sub- Heading: Fees and expenses of the trust

Particulars: Trust Average Net Assets
Where we get Information in Prospectus: In the summary section of the prospectus we will get this information
Heading: Summary
Sub- Heading: Fees and expenses of the trust
Validation Rules: Must explicitly state whether a performance fee exists or not.

Particulars: weather dividend earned from the fund's investments will be re-invested in the fund or will be distributed back to the investors
Heading: dividends and distributions
Validation Rules: Must specify whether dividends are distributed or reinvested. Should include frequency of distribution (e.g., annually, quarterly).

Particulars: Name of the trustee that directly or through act as custodian
Heading: Notes to Financial statements
Sub- Heading: Transactions with Affiliates of the Trustee and Sponsor
Validation Rules: Must provide the legal name of custodian/trustee.

Particulars: Authority who will be appointed as the fund Administrator
Heading: Federal Income Taxes
Sub- Heading: Transactions with Affiliates of the Trustee and Sponsor
Validation Rules: Must provide the legal name.

Particulars: Name of firm who will audit the financial statement of the fund
Where we get Information in Prospectus: Report of independent registered public accounting firm
Heading: Report of independent registered public accounting firm
Validation Rules: Must provide the legal name of the audit firm.

Particulars: The risk and return objective of the fund .
Where we get Information in Prospectus: In the summary section of the prospectus we will get this information
Heading: Summary
Validation Rules: Must clearly state the risk/return objective. Should reference the index or benchmark if applicable.

Particulars: Active /Passive
Heading: Principal Risks of Investing in the Trust
Validation Rules: Must explicitly classify as Active or Passive. Should be a direct statement, not implied.

Particulars: borrow money and then make investments
Where we get Information in Prospectus: ADDITIONAL INFORMATION REGARDING DIVIDENDS AND DISTRIBUTIONS
Heading: investment restrcitions
Validation Rules: Must state whether borrowing for investment is authorized or prohibited.

Particulars: Investment in derivatives is allowed or not
Where we get Information in Prospectus: ADDITIONAL INFORMATION REGARDING DIVIDENDS AND DISTRIBUTIONS
Heading: investment restrcitions
Validation Rules: Must state whether derivatives are authorized or prohibited. Should list examples if applicable.

Particulars: For operations to start the initial no. of units required
Heading: Notes to Financial statements
Validation Rules: Should state the initial no of units required

Particulars: party who will account for all the transaction of the fund
Heading: Notes to Financial statements
Sub- Heading: Transactions with Affiliates of the Trustee and Sponsor
Validation Rules: Should have name and details of the agent

Particulars: Subscription and redemption rules
Where we get Information in Prospectus: PURCHASES AND REDEMPTIONS OF CREATION UNITS
Heading: PURCHASES AND REDEMPTIONS OF CREATION UNITS
Validation Rules: Must specify process for creation/redemption. Should reference Authorized Participants and Distributor.

Particulars: Fees bourne by investors while purchasing the units
Heading: Fees and Expenses of the Trust
Validation Rules: Must explicitly state whether load fees exist or not.

Particulars: REgulatory reporting of the fund
Heading: CONTINUOUS OFFERING OF UNITS
Validation Rules: Should contain regulatory reporting of the fund

Particulars: Certain investment restrictions / not authorized to invest
Where we get Information in Prospectus: Additional  information regarding  dividend and distributions
Heading: Additional  information regarding  dividend and distributions
Validation Rules: Must list prohibited activities/investments. Should be explicit and categorical.

Particulars: fund will comply to which taxation authority
Heading: Federal Income Taxes
Validation Rules: Must specify the tax authority/regulation applicable. Should reference recognized jurisdiction (e.g., U.S. federal tax).

Particulars: any kind concentration limits or restrcitions
Where we get Information in Prospectus: ADDITIONAL INFORMATION REGARDING DIVIDENDS AND DISTRIBUTIONS
Heading: investment restrcitions
Validation Rules: See if any kind concentration limits or restrcitions follow

Particulars: which reporting standard would fund
Heading: Notes to Financial statements

Validation Rules: See which reporting standard would fund
